Package game.model.leaderboard

Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
game.model.leaderboard.ScoreManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IScoreObservable, IBoardObserver 
public class ScoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoardObserver, IScoreObservable
Help class a observable/observer between the leaderboard and the play panel/score panel to update the current scores
